Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the game concept document to understand the overall vision and art style.
Research sound requirements for third-person shooter games. Compile a list of common sound effects (e.g., gunfire, footsteps, environmental sounds).
Break. Browse audio engineering forums for inspiration.
Continue researching sound requirements. Focus on unique sounds that align with the game's art style.
Draft a preliminary sound design document outlining key sound effects and their purposes.
Email @ldes-1 and @cart-1 to discuss the game's vision and art style for sound alignment.
Review feedback from @ldes-1 and @cart-1. Adjust sound design document accordingly.
Wrap up the day by organizing research notes and sound design document.
